record.id: field.name="group.search" and file.name="cm3messages" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: group.search
record.file.name: cm3messages

brief.brief: Determines whether to send the message to the list of operators specified in the Members list of the Groups definition.

detail.detail: For example, if you specified field assign.dept for the Input Field Name and that field contained the value Application, if the group Application exists in the cm3groups table, all operators in the Members list of that record would receive the indicated message.
